metadata.title: CVE-2023-46445 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue in AsyncSSH before 2.14.1 allows attackers to control theextension info message (RFC 8308) via a man-in-the-middle attack, aka a"Rogue Extension Negotiation."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46445` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-asyncssh - 2.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-asyncssh package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.0-1ubuntu0.1').
